ResearchProjectDef.label: fine packaged survival meal
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce packaged survival meals of higher quality which never go bad. Great for traveling longer distances.

ResearchProjectDef.label: lavish packaged survival meal
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce packaged survival meals of impeccable quality which never go bad. Great for traveling very long distances.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Packaging station
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a packaging station and make packaging material used for packaging survival meals into their finished product.
